channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric -- PowerLogic ION9000
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric -- PowerLogic ION9000

item.title: CVE-2022-46680|2024-08-03T14:39:38.551Z -- schneider%20electric -- powerlogic%20ion9000
item.description: A CWE-319: Cleartext transmission of sensitive information vulnerability exists that could cause disclosure of sensitive information, denial of service, or modification of data if an attacker is able to intercept network traffic.
